resources.string:
This tool allows you to modify your build.prop file easily on your device. It also features a variety of descriptions for the properties: 

 - recommended values
 - a proper description
 - a recommended keyboard layout.

If you want to contribute (add a description, create a translation or even donate a bit), mail me or write me on Twitter.

I don't take responsibility for any damage.

Version 1.0b
+ Initial release
Version 1.1b
+ UI redesign
+ Increased performance
+ Increased compatibility with other roms
Version 1.2
+ Added viewmode (for unrooted phones)
+ Added HC and ICS compatibility
+ Added an introduction
+ Increased usability
+ Fixed some typos
Version 1.3
+ Fixed su-problem on several roms
+ Changed app icon
+ Removed debug logs

These are the people who helped me making this great project:

momo.martinovic@gmail.com
 - He designed the great app icon, you have to check him out!
/system is mounted read-only. It has to be remounted as a read-write filesystem.
Type in keyname or choose one
Type in value or choose one
Choose a key to see the description of it
What is this tool used for?

This tool allows you to modify your build.prop file easily on your device. It also features a variety of descriptions for the properties, containing: 

 - recommended values
 - a proper description
 - a recommended keyboard layout.

There\'s also one prerequisite: You\'ve to grant su permissions for this app to work. If you\'ve got no su on your phone, that\'s fine! The app will switch into view mode.\n\nAfter you\'ve granted su, I create a backup of your vanilla build.prop file. This will avoid damaging your android.
This screen indicates the first launch. I\'ll give you a short introduction of what you can do with this awesome piece of goodness right infront of your nose. So let\'s start!
"If you've got a question, a recommendation or something else you can contact me by gently pressing one of those icons. You're also invited to join the thread on (prefered) XDA!
